yaml.title: Orebit Technical Resources
yaml.subtitle: Comprehensive Guides for Geological Data Analysis
yaml.description: Comprehensive guides for mastering geological data analysis with Orebit's R Shiny applications. Learn workflows, best practices, and advanced techniques for GeoDataViz, resource estimation, and mine optimization.
